ReadMe for oofill
=================

Overview
--------

This package allows you to programmatically fill sections in ODT files.
Read the tests to know how it works.


Authors
-------

:atReal Team - contac@atreal.net :
    * Jean-Nicolas Bes [drjnut]
    * Matthias Broquet [tiazma]


Credits
-------

* Sponsorised by City of Savigny-sur-Orge
